name: Star Legacy
blurb: Futuristic Action RPG! Travel the Galaxy! Explore new Worlds! Customize your Hero! Protect the innocent and fight for your survival!

rewards.reward: Your name in Star Legacy Credits! Thanks for your support!
Digital Copy of Star Legacy for PC/MAC! + Previous reward!
Digital Copy of Star Legacy Soundtrack (Over 20 Unique High Quality Songs!) + All previous rewards!

Star Legacy Art e-book (PDF)! A detailed and illustrated book which takes you behind the scenes with Lead Artist Samantha Rogers who will cover all the Star Legacy art including the design process, inspirations, and how we optimize our graphics for mobile devices! + All previous rewards!
Digital Copy of Star Legacy for Android + All previous rewards!

Star Legacy Game Design & Strategy Guide e-book (PDF)! An illustrated in-depth look into Star Legacy's game design and features! Includes a strategy guide, walkthrough, and tips and tricks! + All previous rewards!

Star Legacy iOS beta access! Play Star Legacy on your iOS device before the game is released! Optionally send your feedback and ideas directly to the Star Legacy team! Beta access REQUIRES an iOS device AND your Unique Device Identifier (UDID), you can find your UDID very easily when connecting your device to a computer with iTunes! + All previous rewards!

NAME YOUR OWN NPC! Collaborate with our Lead Developer to choose an available NPC type and give them a name or simply name them after yourself (certain restrictions may apply for the name's theme, foul language, or character limits)! Selecting the NPC in game will bring up a dialogue display including your NPC's name and an image of the character (NPC's dialogue will be chosen by Lead Developer or POSSIBLY collaborated with the Backer at the Developer's discretion)! Will also list your name alongside an image of your NPC and their name in the credits, and on the official Star Legacy Website! + All $50 rewards!

CREATE AND DESIGN YOUR OWN ENEMY! Work directly with the team to create a unique enemy! The enemy can be any existing animal or a totally new character or creature created in collaboration between you and our Lead Artist! The enemy will also have at least one unique ability used against our hero during game play! Will also list your name alongside your enemy's image in the credits, our Facebook page, and on the official Star Legacy Website! + All $50 rewards!

CREATE AND DESIGN YOUR OWN PET! Work directly with the team to create a unique pet to assist the Hero on their adventure! The pet can be any existing animal or a totally new creature created in collaboration between you and our Lead Artist! The pet will also have at least one unique ability which can assist the Hero during game play! Will also list your name alongside your pet's image in the credits, our Facebook page, and on the official Star Legacy Website! + All $50 rewards!

CREATE AND DESIGN YOUR OWN ENEMY BOSS! Work directly with the team to create a unique Enemy Boss to battle against the hero! The Boss can be any existing animal or a totally new character or creature created in collaboration between you and our Lead Artist! The Enemy Boss will also have at least two unique abilities used against our hero during game play! Will also list your name alongside your Boss's image in the credits, our Facebook page, and on the official Star Legacy Website! + All $50 rewards!

CREATE AND DESIGN YOUR OWN ARMOR SET! Work directly with the team to create a unique Armor Set for the Hero! Collaborate with our Lead Artist to design the Armor of your dreams! Name your Armor Set (certain restrictions may apply for the name's theme, foul language, and character limits)! Will also list your name alongside an image of your Armor equipped on the Hero in the credits, our Facebook page, and on the official Star Legacy Website! + All $50 rewards!

CREATE AND DESIGN YOUR OWN HERO SKILL OR SPELL (some game design restrictions may apply)! Work directly with the team to create a unique Skill or Spell to be used by the Hero during game play! Collaborate with our Lead Developer and Lead Artist to design the Skill or Spell of your dreams! Name your Skill or Spell (certain restrictions may apply for the name's theme, foul language, and character limits)! Will also list your name alongside an image of the Hero using your Skill or Spell in the credits, our Facebook page, and on the official Star Legacy Website! + All $50 rewards!

CREATE AND DESIGN YOUR OWN MINI-GAME FOR STAR LEGACY (some game design restrictions may apply)! Work directly with the team to create a unique Star Legacy themed Mini-Game which can be found inside the Casino! Collaborate with our Lead Developer and Lead Artist to design the mini-game of your dreams! Name your Mini-Game (certain restrictions may apply for the name's theme, foul language, and character limits)! Will also list your name alongside an image of your mini-game in the credits, our Facebook page, and the official Star Legacy Website! + All $50 rewards!
